title: EPIC-002: Agent Configurator - Define, Validate, Apply

epic.title: Core Domain Logic & Business Rules
epic.goal: Implement dialog management, message handling, token accounting, model selection, and agent configuration with enforcement of business rules

deliverables: Production-ready implementation strictly for this story scope
Automated tests required by acceptance criteria
Minimal documentation/README updates required to run/test the change
acceptance_criteria: Agent types defined: default (temperature=0.7), code_assistant (temperature=0.2, max_tokens=4096), creative_writer (temperature=0.9)
Validate agent config: temperature 0-1, max_tokens > 0 and <= model context_window
Merge agent config with dialog settings (agent config takes precedence or vice versa, document)
Return 400 if invalid agent name or config ranges
Unit tests cover validation, merging logic
description: Implement agent configurator: define agent types (default, code_assistant, creative_writer), validate agent config (temperature, max_tokens), merge with dialog settings.
